## Synthetic Data

```{r}
raw <- generate_synthetic_data(n_cells = 5, n_time = 500, spike_prob = 0.05)
head(raw)
```

## Run Analysis

```{r}
res <- run_analysis(raw, span = 0.45, penalty = 1, ar_order = 2)
```

### Example Cell Trace

